title: Please bring out the legacy client again, new client still screwing up for me everyday
body: My client is still screwing up again, its been happening to me every single day, in champ select, when someone is picking their champ, it goes to 0 seconds and stays there for idek, 10 secs, and sometimes even makes me dodges games, its really annoying for me and really ruining my game experience, does anyone know i can do to fix that? also please bring out the legacy client again as an option to use as a client cause i never had any problems with it, and im pretty sure alot of people never had problems with it too, so please help!
